channel.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
channel.description:
Hey guys, let us know what you think!
* What would you like to see? * What should be done differently? * How can we improve?
We are gamers, too, we feel you! Most of all, **we listen.**

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
FadeBlade:

Any chance you could add a return feature so if someone leaves the game they have the ability to return to it

This is a very good question… I believe we prefer this way to encourage people to stay throughout with a chance to rejoin. If we code this, we’d likely aim for beta and have it ready for release. I’m not sure if we can make it to alpha… But we’ll see ask me again in 2 months haha. I’d say 80 percent change we’d do this.

Read full topic
item.source: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
Any chance you could add a return feature so if someone leaves the game they have the ability to return to it. To many times have I left in these types of games only to not be able to return. you could even use it as a way to counter people who leave
so until your previous game ends you can’t start a new 1

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Ha not bad Would you mind being making the above post into it’s own thread? That way we can find it later when we’re ready to code in more classes, if we take the suggestion in! It’ll also give others a nice template of where to post class suggestions ~

Perhaps call it [Class Suggestion] The Orphan (Neutral Wild Class)

FadeBlade:

thanks just wondering what happens since it was never really stated in the wiki

Ah, I’ll edit that soon. The Wiki is currently locked, but once the game releases, we’ll open it up so the community can help fix typos

Read full topic

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
so would it be read out like this

orphan (Neutral Wild Class

Night ability 1) on day 1 or 2 you can pick someone to become your father figure. should your father figure die you will become his role If you pick a Blue dragon member and targeted by the mastermind when your target dies you become the black rose version otherwise immune to convert

(back story version
on one rainy day, you were begging for food eating the scraps you got barely able to survive. until 1 fortune day you met a stranger who took pity on you, he took you back the castle, where you gained a better place to live. however not long after you began trying as a knight hand’s

years later he died killed by the black rose later that day you took your father’s sword and vowed to end the reign of the black rose once and for ever

Back story Blackrose version

You always lived a terrible life you were always a slave nothing more than a tool it was like that even since you were a kid nothing but work and the worse of bread. it’s a miracle your even alive. however, you grew tired and kept getting your master did not approve. as he yelled at a knife came from the back slaying your master, a figure in a cloaked robe offered you a new life, a life you could not refuse. this day you joined the black rose.

since then you have had but 1 purpose rule the throne

How do you think?

Read full topic

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
FadeBlade:

for 1 is it neutral because I don’t see a black rose member helping the cult out? who’s side is it on

The 2nd Point I have is it’s kinda weird because the max number of black rose members seems to only be 2 so you could only change what 1 member is seen as

The final point with is what is the blue dragon version because the point of black rose is to convert the blue dragon to their cause saying that this is only for the black rose defies all that

Hi there – I can clarify a few things:

  1. The Cult is their own faction – Correct: They will not defend the Black Rose
  2. The Black Rose will start with two people. There can be a max of 4 (2 converted). This may change over the course of alpha/beta let’s see what people think and can always tweak balance later.
bigejaws:

maybe there can be kid role where the kid chooses someone to be their father figure n1 or 2 (so they dont choose someone because they know their role). when that person dies the kid will become that role.

This is quite unique! I’ll add it this to our idea board with your name beside it.

Read full topic
item.source: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: bigejaws
item.description:
if it a good king he will become good noble man. if its a bad king he will become bad noble man. if cult leader he will become a cult if cult leader dies ( same if he chooses a cult member) however if he is cult when the mastermind dies he will become cult leader. if cult when mastermind dies he will become a cult leader however if there is one he will kill the cult leader to take his place. if in black rose then he will become the mastermind. if blue dragon he will become a new role that converts black rose/ cult back to blue dragon. except for the leaders

the role should be called orphan because he needs a father figure

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
its a good start but I see many problems with it,

for 1 is it neutral because I don’t see a black rose member helping the cult out? who’s side is it on

The 2nd Point I have is it’s kinda weird because the max number of black rose members seems to only be 2 so you could only change what 1 member is seen as

The final point with is what is the blue dragon version because the point of black rose is to convert the blue dragon to their cause saying that this is only for the black rose defies all that

Apart from that all it has potential and a good basis to use for something cool

Read full topic

item.title: Have something to offer? Let us know! We value you :)
item.dc:creator: bigejaws
item.description:
maybe a role like deceiver. the role disguise anyone in the black rose or cult as someone else. meaning if john (deceiver) disguises Harold (cult/blackrose) as vik (any role) harold will come up as viks role if a sheriff views him. however if vik is viewed he will still be his role.

also if a observer watches someone and Harold attacks that person it will come up as vik. same will go if john disguises any other black rose or cult. however if observer watches harold he will see him being disguised.

fell free to say this is bad or to change anything. im not really good with this stuff this role can really backfire if you disguise someone as prince or assassin so on
